files.name: Graphic Herbalism MWSE
files.description: Main mod includes MWSE + vanilla and smoothed meshes.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.01 Removed collision from chokeweed and roobrush because it's annoying. Fixed marshmerrow_03 - both vanilla and smoothed version. Fixed kwama egg sac. Made picked kreshweed more obvious, cutting all their leaves instead of a few. Uprooted corkbulb instead of making it disappear. Removed more leaves from Apel's picked kreshweed. Removed collision from Vurt's chokeweed and roobrush and removed some leaves from the chokeweed. Updated MWSE scripts

files.name: GH Patches and Replacers
files.description:
Includes patches for all well-known replacers, as well as meshes for Morrowind Crafting and ST Alchemy.

DON'T INSTALL EVERY OPTION WITHOUT CHECKING THEIR REQUIREMENTS, LIKE A TOTAL NUMPTY - SEE REPLACER README FOR REQUIREMENTS
files.changelog_html: Version 1.01 Removed collision from chokeweed and roobrush because it's annoying. Fixed marshmerrow_03 - both vanilla and smoothed version. Fixed kwama egg sac. Made picked kreshweed more obvious, cutting all their leaves instead of a few. Uprooted corkbulb instead of making it disappear. Removed more leaves from Apel's picked kreshweed. Removed collision from Vurt's chokeweed and roobrush and removed some leaves from the chokeweed. Updated MWSE scripts

files.name: GH TR - PT Meshes
files.description: Meshes for Tamriel Rebuilt and Project Tamriel.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.01 Removed collision from chokeweed and roobrush because it's annoying. Fixed marshmerrow_03 - both vanilla and smoothed version. Fixed kwama egg sac. Made picked kreshweed more obvious, cutting all their leaves instead of a few. Uprooted corkbulb instead of making it disappear. Removed more leaves from Apel's picked kreshweed. Removed collision from Vurt's chokeweed and roobrush and removed some leaves from the chokeweed. Updated MWSE scripts

files.name: GH_trama_patch
files.description: Temporary patch (until Patch for Purist fixes it) adds missing organic flag to tramaroot_06 so GH will recognize it. Also adds its missing leveled list.

files.name: GH_trama_patch
files.description: Temporary patch (until Patch for Purists fixes issue) adds missing organic flag to tramaroot_06 so GH will recognize it. Also adds its missing leveled list.

files.name: Graphic Herbalism MWSE
files.description: Main mod includes MWSE + vanilla and smoothed meshes.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.02 Warning message for out of date MWSE version fixed. Added warning message for out of date Quickloot. Added esp patch for missing organic flag on tramaroot_06 as a separate download.

files.name: GH_MWSE_Update_1.02
files.description:
Lite update - MWSE scripts and docs only. Included in latest main file.

Will now warn you if your MWSE is out of date, or Mort's Quickloot if you're using it.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.02 Warning message for out of date MWSE version fixed. Added warning message for out of date Quickloot. Added esp patch for missing organic flag on tramaroot_06 as a separate download.

files.name: Old GH Save Cleaner
files.description: Wrye Mash remover for cleaning the old Graphic Herbalism from your saves.

files.name: Graphic Herbalism MWSE - OpenMW
files.description: Main mod includes MWSE + vanilla and smoothed meshes. OpenMW users only need the meshes from this package.
files.changelog_html: Fix for MWSE bug that makes organic containers disappear on respawn until cell is reloaded. Fixed wrong MCM labels on whitelist. Updated instructions in old GH save cleaner readme.

files.name: GH_MWSE_Update_1.03
files.description:
Lite update - MWSE scripts and docs only. Included in latest main file.
OpenMW users don't need this.

Will now warn you if your MWSE or Mort's Quickloot is out of date.
Fixed containers temporarily disappearing on respawn due to MWSE error.
files.changelog_html: Fix for MWSE bug that makes organic containers disappear on respawn until cell is reloaded. Fixed wrong MCM labels on whitelist. Updated instructions in old GH save cleaner readme.

files.name: Old GH Save Cleaner
files.description:
Wrye Mash remover for cleaning the old Graphic Herbalism from your saves.

Added more detailed instructions to the readme.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.01 Removed collision from chokeweed and roobrush because it's annoying. Fixed marshmerrow_03 - both vanilla and smoothed version. Fixed kwama egg sac. Made picked kreshweed more obvious, cutting all their leaves instead of a few. Uprooted corkbulb instead of making it disappear. Removed more leaves from Apel's picked kreshweed. Removed collision from Vurt's chokeweed and roobrush and removed some leaves from the chokeweed. Updated MWSE scripts

files.name: GH_MWSE_Update_1.03
files.description:
Lite update - MWSE scripts and docs only. Included in latest main file.
OpenMW users don't need this update.

Will now warn you if your MWSE or Quickloot is out of date.
Fixes meshes disappearing on respawn before cell is reloaded.
files.changelog_html: Fix for MWSE bug that makes organic containers disappear on respawn until cell is reloaded. Fixed wrong MCM labels on whitelist. Updated instructions in old GH save cleaner readme.

files.name: GH TR - PT Meshes
files.description:
Meshes for Tamriel Rebuilt and Project Tamriel.

Removed juvenile weepveil (04) that wasn't intended to despawn.
files.changelog_html: Version 1.01 Removed collision from chokeweed and roobrush because it's annoying. Fixed marshmerrow_03 - both vanilla and smoothed version. Fixed kwama egg sac. Made picked kreshweed more obvious, cutting all their leaves instead of a few. Uprooted corkbulb instead of making it disappear. Removed more leaves from Apel's picked kreshweed. Removed collision from Vurt's chokeweed and roobrush and removed some leaves from the chokeweed. Updated MWSE scripts
